properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique identification number for this spacecraft

properties.name: name
properties.description: The common name for this spacecraft

properties.name: constellation
properties.description: The constellation, or group, that this spacecraft belongs to

properties.name: rx
properties.description: The x position at the scenario epoch

properties.name: ry
properties.description: The y position at the scenario epoch

properties.name: rz
properties.description: The z position at the scenario epoch

properties.name: vx
properties.description: The x velocity at the scenario epoch

properties.name: vy
properties.description: The y velocity at the scenario epoch

properties.name: vz
properties.description: The z velocity at the scenario epoch
